Training Trait.name: Combat Ready
Training Trait.description: Once per combat, you may discard one Exertion Counter

Training Trait.name: I Know a Guy
Training Trait.description: Once per session, you may make a Spirit roll to invoke a contact (previously introduced or new) that can help you in your current situation. On a failure, the contact still comes up, but you two arenâ€™t on good terms

Training Trait.name: Chosen
Training Trait.description: You may use spells from the General Spell List

Training Trait.name: Workstation
Training Trait.description: Once per session, you may (if given enough time) make a Wits roll to fashion a minor invention based on your Focus. On a failure, the device may malfunction on use (with potential risk for more volatile creations)
